TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit XamlParseException extends System.SystemException

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Serializable

summary.span: 表示来自 WPF 分析器的、特定于分析器的异常的异常类。

span.span: Represents the exception class for parser-specific exceptions from a WPF XAML parser.

summary.span: 此异常用于 .NET Framework 3.0 和 .NET Framework 3.5 中的 XAML API 或 WPF XAML 分析器操作，或者通过调用 API 而特别用于 WPF XAML 分析器。

span.span: This exception is used in XAML API or WPF XAML parser operations from .NET Framework 3.0 and .NET Framework 3.5, or for specific use of the WPF XAML parser by calling API.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅用于 WPF 应用程序执行解析 / 加载 XAML 的 WPF 实现 XAML 分析器。 is used only for the WPF-implemented XAML parser that performs the XAML parsing and loading for WPF applications. 具体而言，异常是仅当应用程序的目标时才可用[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]。Specifically, the exception is only relevant when an application targets [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]. 该异常也可来自运行时调用挂钩 WPF 实现 XAML 分析器加载 XAML 从正在运行的 WPF 应用程序中的 Api 中的用户代码 (例如，调用)。The exception can also originate from user code in run-time calls to APIs that hook up the WPF-implemented XAML parser to load XAML from within a running WPF application (for example, calls to ). 有关[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，则一般会报告 XAML 处理异常的异常在不同的命名空间中定义 () 和不同的程序集 (System.Xaml)。For [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the exception that typically reports XAML processing exceptions is defined in a different namespace () and a different assembly (System.Xaml). 除非被写入到 WPF XAML 分析器的等效值或使用[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]并[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]目标，您通常不会引发从你自己的代码。Unless you are writing an equivalent to the WPF XAML parser or working with [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] targeting, you generally will not throw from your own code. 但是，异常处理有时很有必要。However, handling for the exception is sometimes necessary. 对于应用程序方案，其中可能会想要取消显示 XAML 分析错误， 应用程序级别的事件处理程序是一种方法来处理运行时。For application scenarios, where you may want to suppress XAML parse errors, a event handler at the application level is one way to handle a run-time . 是否要取消显示异常或让他们表面到用户代码取决于如何设计用于加载 XAML，应用程序并将其分配到 XAML 应用程序的信任级别加载。Whether to suppress exceptions or let them surface to user code depends on how you design your application for purposes of loading XAML, and the trust level that you assign to the XAML your application loads. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XAML 安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xaml-security-considerations.md)或"XAML 安全性"部分中的[XAML 概述 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md)。For more information, see [XAML Security Considerations](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xaml-security-considerations.md) or "XAML Security" section of [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md). 有关应用程序的页时是抛出，它是通常的上下文中`InitializeComponent`页面类，这是在每个页面级别的 WPF XAML 分析器的 WPF 应用程序模型的使用情况的入口点进行调用。For pages of an application, when the is thrown, it is usually in the context of the `InitializeComponent` call made by your page class, which is the entry point for the WPF application model's usage of the WPF XAML parser at the per-page level. 另一个可能的处理策略是将因此`try/catch`中的块， `InitializeComponent`。Therefore another possible handling strategy is to place `try/catch` blocks in `InitializeComponent`. 但是，此方法不会将更好地与模板，可视化设计图面和其他生成设置源该挂钩`InitializeComponent`。However, this technique does not integrate well with templates, visual design surfaces and other generated sources that hook up `InitializeComponent`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为前一个异常的直接结果引发的异常，应包括对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception. 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.

summary.span: 引发异常时获取基 URI 信息。

span.span: Gets base URI information when the exception is thrown.
The parser context base URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基本 URI 位于可能由于分析器上下文时出现异常。Base URI is potentially available because of parser context when the exception occurred. 了解基 URI 可以是用于调试的情况下资源解析错误的根本原因。Knowing the base URI can be useful for debugging cases where a resource resolution error is the underlying cause.
